text: PSA  Be mindful of what you put on your school accounts  It is NOT private  The Admins in charge of the account can see your chats  your google docs  your emails  all of it  I work for a company that scans through kid s accounts which some school districts use to offload the work  I see a frankly shocking amount of people that don t seem to know they re being watched  I decided to remedy that  at least in some small way So here s the deal   If you have a school Google account  and use it for shit other than school  stop Unless you want your private life combed through by strangers you dont know  keep all your private things  chats  fanfiction  family photos  etc  on a different account  Same story if you have a school Office   account  Do not log into ANYTHING non school related with your school Google account  either  Don t buy anything through it  don t watch youtube videos on it  just don t touch it outside of assignments or mandatory use   ALL of your activity on that account is subject to review by anyone with access   This is doubly important If you re doing something the school board won t approve of  vaping  sexual intimacy  knife fighting with the bois  whatever  If you post anything related to that on your school account  it WILL get flagged  and you could wind up in a very uncomfortable conversation with your counselor  or worse  Please  just be careful what you put on your school accounts  I see a  lot  of fanfiction or intimate chat conversations that were never intended to see the light of day  and certainly not on these terms  You all deserve privacy  Take a few minutes and make sure you have it
summary: Admins in charge of the account can see all of the activity on the school Google account. If you have a school Office account, don't use it for anything other than school work. All activity on that account is subject to review by anyone with access.
cleaned: admin charge account activity school google account school office account not use school work activity account subject review access

text: There really isn t any reason to live  so why should I I can t really feel anything anymore  Sure I can laugh  sure I can get angry but it doesn t feel real   Everything we do in life is to keep us occupied with the fact that everything we do is meaningless  We all will die  eventually our legacies will die out and every single memory  piece of evidence of our life actually taking place will be gone Eventually our sun will die out and that will be the end   Even if we weren t going to die out why would I try  In this world where people can t see reason  where people just can t seem to understand whats best for themselves  Where people try to annoyingly  teach  you that everyone is worth the same amount  even though that is clearely utterly fake   I remember being able to actually feel things when I was younger  I was happy  I was excited  I could actually FEEL things  Now things just happen and time goes by Family members have gone  friends have past yet not a single tear has been shed  I didn t choose to live  I never signed up to have to be forced to work the rest of my life away just to be able to afford food   So why shouldn t I end it if there is nothing positive in my life anymore   I am sorry for the long post but as I have also lost my sense of time its hard to realise how much one can write on the subject of nothingness
summary: There is no reason to live in a world where people can't see reason and everyone is worth the same amount. I used to be able to feel things when I was younger. Now things just happen and time goes by and there is nothing positive in my life anymore.
cleaned: no reason live world people not reason worth able feel thing young thing happen time go positive life anymore

text: Approaching   years since my uncle diedAs I was growing up all my relatives told me I looked like him  My mother was never the same when he died  Part of her shrunk  My sisters told me she wasn t fully sane for a year or two  As I got older I got more curious  Looking for photos and asking about him even watching old videos of him  I felt something  I could relate to him so much  I felt like he was me  Corner of the room  Cracking the sly joke  Then when I got to   my mother finally told me more  Showed me his note he left to my grand parents  His writing totally connected with him  Everything he said  I could feel on a different level   I never met him but I can t help but think we d be very close  I wish I could of met him  I ve been in dark places and thought about suicide  Thinking about him and looking at photos and stories of him makes me feel better  I feel like I need to live for him  He looked like the nicest person ever  Deep blue eyes and gentle  I m finding it tough because I just miss the guy even though I ve never met him  Not sure how it s possible You help me through the day   No tears  no fears Remember there s always tomorrow So what if we have to part We ll be together again
summary: It's been 4 years since my uncle died. He left a note for his family. My mother was never the same after he died. She wasn't fully sane for a year or two. She misses him even though she hasn't met him.
